name: Geocells Tricells
description: Tricells is a tranquil logic puzzle game and is the first game in the Geocells series.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.6Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
